concept.subtitle: Concept
concept.title: World's First Premium Adult Entertainment Membership NFT
concept.description: SPICY NFT CLUB is the world's first project to revolutionize premium adult entertainment membership with Web3 technology. Under the concept of 'Enjoy premium adult entertainment. Own it. Turn it into an asset.', we evolve the industry into safe and sustainable premium entertainment.

vision.label: VISION
vision.text: Innovating Premium Adult Entertainment with You

mission.label: MISSION
mission.text: Evolve the adult entertainment industry into a safe, fair, and attractive sector through technology and professional management, providing valuable experiences and possibilities to global stakeholders.

features.title: Legality and Safety
features.description: Strictly comply with Japanese Entertainment Business Act and realize clean operation that excludes anti-social forces.

features.title: Win-Win Structure
features.description: An ecosystem where casts, guests, and holders all benefit - 'Everyone profits together'.

features.title: Evolution through DX
features.description: Promote transparency and efficiency, and enable systematic high-quality service delivery.

items.title: Virtually Free* Usage Rights
items.description: Just by holding the NFT, you will receive *VIP usage rights worth 500,000 JPY annually. It generates value just by holding.

items.title: Secondary Market Trading
items.description: Since it is purchased as an NFT, it can be sold on OpenSea and other secondary markets.

items.title: Participate in Management
items.description: You can participate in project decision-making through management voting rights (Governance).

items.title: Holding Rewards & Utility
items.description: Rewards based on store revenue and utilities that increase with holding period. Directly enjoy the growth of the business.

items.title: Funding Barriers
items.description: Traditional financial institutions make it difficult to secure loans, creating a major barrier to business expansion.

items.title: Opaque Management
items.description: Structural issues make management transparency difficult, hindering trust from stakeholders.

items.title: Closed Structure
items.description: The industry's inherent exclusivity has stifled innovation and healthy competition.

solution.subtitle: The Solution
solution.title: Limited to 400. Key to the Future.
solution.description: SPICY NFT CLUB is the world's first premium adult entertainment membership NFT project innovating with Web3 technology. Limited issuance of 200 on Ethereum + 200 on Solana (Total: 400 NFTs).

items.title: Transparency & Freedom
items.description: Dual-chain issuance: 200 on Ethereum + 200 on Solana. Ensuring asset security with world-standard technology.

items.title: Solid Revenue Base
items.description: Sustainable business model based on real operations of luxury delivery health services in Tokyo (30k-50k JPY/90min).

items.title: Strict Compliance
items.description: Compliance with all relevant laws including the Entertainment Business Act and Payment Services Act. Clean operation supervised by lawyers.

items.title: VIP Usage Rights Worth 500,000 JPY Annually
items.description: Free usage quota at project-operated stores and special discounts at partner stores. Simply holding provides value exceeding the purchase price.

items.title: Priority Reservation Rights
items.description: Priority reservations even for popular staff and peak periods. Arranged by dedicated concierge desk for members.

items.title: Travel Usage Support
items.description: Smooth access to carefully selected services through partner networks even during business trips or travel.

items.title: Exclusive Event Participation
items.description: Invitations to special events exclusively for holders, such as secret parties and meet-and-greets with staff.

items.title: Store Revenue Returns
items.description: Sharing business success with holders. Return program planned with 5% of store revenue as source.

items.title: Management Voting Rights
items.description: Voting rights to participate in important project decisions such as new store locations and service content.

whitepaper.title: SPICY NFT CLUB Whitepaper
whitepaper.subtitle: NFT Membership
whitepaper.overview: Project Overview: The world’s first premium membership NFT project revolutionizing the adult entertainment industry with Web3 technology. Centered on safety, legality, and technological utilization, we promote the opening and operation of a luxury delivery health (escort) establishment in Tokyo. Issuing a limited 500 premium membership NFTs operated on dual chains of Ethereum and Solana. Holders are provided with premium experiences, priority usage rights, and potential value appreciation. Strict compliance with Japan’s Adult Entertainment Business Act and cryptocurrency laws of various countries, with absolute exclusion of any ties to antisocial organizations. As a transparent membership club, we aim to clean up the industry and create sustainable entertainment.
whitepaper.vision: Innovating Quality Adult Entertainment With You
whitepaper.mission: To evolve the adult entertainment industry into a safe, fair, and attractive sector through technology and expert management, delivering valuable experiences and opportunities to global stakeholders.

executive_summary.title: 1. Executive Summary (Overview & Concept)
executive_summary.content: SPICY NFT CLUB is the world’s first premium membership NFT project in the adult entertainment sector. With the concept of “Enjoy quality adult entertainment. Own it as an asset.”, we aim to evolve the industry into a transparent and sustainable premium entertainment experience.
executive_summary.concept_title: Core Concept: What is “Quality Adult Entertainment”?
executive_summary.concept_intro: The “quality adult entertainment” our project pursues realizes the following three elements:

pillars.title: 1. Safe Enjoyment
items: Elimination of overcharging and zero involvement with underground societies through a fully membership-based system
A clean and secure environment managed by trusted professionals

pillars.title: 2. Legality
items: Legal operation fully compliant with Japan’s Adult Entertainment Business Act (clearly distinguished from prostitution, managed prostitution, and human trafficking)
Voluntary participation of cast members through web recruitment, complete exclusion of child prostitution
Further strengthening Japan’s uniquely clean sex work environment recognized globally

pillars.title: 3. Mutual Profitability (Win-Win for All Stakeholders)
items: A structure where users, cast, holders, and management all benefit without loss
Liquidity secured through fractionalized NFTs and steady profit returns
Operational efficiency improved by digital transformation → increased profit margins → proactive returns to cast and holders

executive_summary.closing: By holding one of the limited 500 premium membership NFTs, holders gain preferential use of Tokyo’s luxury delivery health services, priority reservations, annual VIP rights, and potential asset formation through NFT value appreciation and secondary market trading. Led by a CEO with 12 years of industry experience and approximately 2 billion yen in annual sales, a grand opening of the Tokyo store is planned for 2026. Transparency is ensured via Ethereum/Solana dual chains.

highlights.label: Premium Experience
highlights.value: Member-exclusive benefits, annual usage rights, event participation

highlights.label: Value Potential
highlights.value: NFT scarcity, buyback considerations, linkage to store revenue

highlights.label: Reliability
highlights.value: Legal compliance, experienced management, information disclosure

background.title: 2. Project Background
background.intro: Japan’s adult entertainment industry is a massive market estimated at approximately 5 to 7 trillion yen (2025 forecast), yet it faces numerous longstanding challenges.

challenges.title: Difficulty in Fundraising
challenges.description: Bank loans unavailable; expectation gaps with investors (income gain vs capital gain)

challenges.title: Operational Risks
challenges.description: Frequent reckless expansions and failures due to insufficient industry understanding; concentrated legal risks

challenges.title: Social Image
challenges.description: Entry barriers due to gray zones and societal prejudice

challenges.title: Supply-Demand Imbalance
challenges.description: Exploitative structures, excessive labor for cast members, industry contraction trends

background.ceo_story: The CEO (248ma) previously worked at a major recruitment advertising company, experienced an independent business failure, then entered the adult entertainment industry (12 years experience, founded and operated 10 stores with approximately 2 billion yen in annual sales). Having keenly felt the industry’s discomforts (management failures, investment gaps, human rights risks), the CEO devised a new model utilizing NFTs.
innovations: Fractionalization enabling individual investment and liquidity (secondary market)
Governance participation rights retained while entrusting operations to experts (risk diversification)
Digital transformation (app and reservation system) reducing costs → improving profits → increasing returns
A collective of clean management accelerating industry health and diversification
background.closing: Starting with the opening of a luxury delivery health store in Tokyo, we aim for stable growth through a “small, solid store collective” model. Holders can participate as a “proud investment target.” Japan’s adult entertainment environment is globally unique in legality and cleanliness, and this project challenges to further evolve it with Web3.

nft_overview.title: 3. NFT Overview
nft_overview.intro: The SPICY NFT CLUB Membership NFT is the industry’s first premium membership NFT, issuing a limited 500 units (400 for sale + 100 reserved for management). Members (holders) receive exclusive benefits such as priority reservations and annual usage rights. Issued on dual chains of Ethereum and Solana, the 400 sale units are split evenly with 200 on each chain.
nft_overview.pricing_description: The starting price is 0.01 ETH on Ethereum and 0.2 SOL on Solana, increasing automatically by 0.01 ETH or 0.2 SOL respectively with each unit sold. This mechanism maximizes the advantage for early purchasers by enabling acquisition at lower prices.

specs.label: Total Issuance
specs.value: Limited to 500 units (no additional issuance, ensuring scarcity)

utilities.title: VIP Benefits
utilities.description: Priority reservations at Tokyo luxury delivery health, annual usage rights (equivalent to 500,000 JPY/year), travel usage support, exclusive events (e.g., store naming rights auction, premium parties), various discounts

utilities.title: Scarcity
utilities.description: Value appreciation potential due to maximum limitation of 500 units

utilities.title: Governance
utilities.description: Voting rights on new service proposals and store expansions

sale_schedule.label: Price Display
sale_schedule.value: Real-time price display (official website and dashboard)

sale_schedule.label: Price Fluctuation
sale_schedule.value: Automatic price increase until sold out (remaining quantity and current price always displayed)

business_model.title: 4. Business Model
business_model.intro: SPICY NFT CLUB will open a luxury delivery health in Tokyo, innovating the vast adult entertainment market with Web3. Forecasted first-year sales of 60 million JPY (5 million JPY monthly) and 120 million JPY by year three, offering investors revenue potential and NFT value appreciation. Quarterly project reports and monthly store management updates will be shared within an exclusive community, with transparent disclosure of fund usage. This solid model redefines luxury entertainment.

store_details.label: Business Type
store_details.value: Luxury delivery health (priced approximately 30,000 to 50,000 JPY per 90 minutes, offering various niche concept stores)

store_details.label: Concept
store_details.value: Recruitment from members to participate in creating the ideal store

revenue.label: Year Three
revenue.value: 120 million JPY (10 million JPY monthly, with plans for multi-store expansion)

market_analysis.title: 5. Market Analysis
market_analysis.content: The Japanese adult entertainment industry market size is estimated at approximately 5.8 to 7.8 trillion JPY. Combined with the growth of the NFT market, this positions the project as an attractive high-yield opportunity for individual investors. By resolving traditional fundraising difficulties through Web3 and providing transparency and liquidity, the project aims to attract new entrants.

technical_details.title: 6. Technical Details
technical_details.content: Dual adoption of Ethereum (ERC721) and Solana (Metaplex) chains. Achieves low fees and high-speed transactions, with planned future cross-chain compatibility. Smart contracts ensure royalties (3% on secondary sales) and authentication. User experience is prioritized in purchase, trading, and usage flows.

compliance.title: 7. Compliance and Risk Management
compliance.content: Strict adherence to the Adult Entertainment Business Act and cryptocurrency laws. NFTs are designed as premium membership rights (no investment guarantees). Absolute exclusion of antisocial organizations, fraud prevention, market fluctuation countermeasures, and social prejudice mitigation are enforced. Transparency is maintained within a limited community.

team.title: 8. Team
team.intro: The SPICY NFT CLUB team comprises experts from the adult entertainment industry and Web3 specialists.

members.name: 248ma
members.description: 12 years in the adult entertainment industry with experience founding and operating 10 stores (annual sales scale of 2 billion JPY). Other participating experts include Web3 project veterans, lawyers, administrative scriveners, and AI developers. Dedicated team members will increase as the project expands.

items.title: Start of public sale and community building
Launch of member-exclusive website and preparation for grand store opening
Grand opening of Tokyo store, commencement of initial revenue sharing, implementation of staking and cross-chain bridge
Multi-store expansion, DAO governance initiation, expansion of additional utilities

faq.title: 10. FAQ

items.question: Is the project safe?
items.answer: Legal compliance, led by an experienced CEO, and verified by experts.

items.question: What is the revenue potential?
items.answer: Linked to store revenue, secondary market price appreciation, and buyback considerations (no guarantees).

items.question: What about fraud risks?
items.answer: Official channels provide awareness and thorough countermeasures.

faq.note: Additional: Transparency is maintained to address market fluctuations and social prejudice.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.content: Inquiries accepted via official website, X (Twitter), Telegram, and email. AMA sessions planned.

items.label: Allocation
items.value: 80% for sale (400 units), 20% for team (100 units)

items.label: Revenue Sharing
items.value: Partial return of store sales planned

disclaimer.title: 13. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This project does not guarantee profits or value appreciation; participation is at one’s own risk. Market fluctuations, operational risks, and regulatory changes may occur. This document is not intended as investment solicitation.
disclaimer.note: This document is the latest version of the whitepaper as of January 1, 2026. Please refer to official channels for the most current information.

steps.title: Create a Wallet
steps.description: Create a cryptocurrency wallet such as MetaMask and install it in your browser.

steps.title: Purchase & Send ETH
steps.description: Purchase ETH (Ethereum) on an exchange and send it to your created wallet.

steps.title: Connect Wallet
steps.description: Click the 'Buy NFT' button on this site and connect your wallet.

steps.title: Purchase NFT
steps.description: Select the quantity on the purchase screen, approve the transaction, and complete the purchase.

market.subtitle: Market Opportunity
market.title: Untapped Huge Market.
market.description: Japan Adult Market (~7.8T JPY) × Web3 Market (~7T JPY). A blue ocean where two giant markets intersect.

bonding_curve.title: Bonding Curve Sales Model
bonding_curve.description: SPICY NFT CLUB NFTs are priced using a Bonding Curve model. For every NFT sold, the price immediately increases by 0.01 ETH (or 0.2 SOL).

features.title: Price Increase Mechanism
features.description: Ethereum: 1st → 0.01 ETH, 2nd → 0.02 ETH, 100th → 1.00 ETH, 200th → 2.00 ETH (Sold Out) / Solana: 1st → 0.2 SOL, 2nd → 0.4 SOL, 100th → 20 SOL, 200th → 40 SOL (Sold Out)

features.title: Benefits of Early Purchase
features.description: Available at the lowest price immediately after sales start. The earlier you buy, the significantly cheaper it is. As prices soar later, early holders benefit from the large price difference.

features.title: Mint Now to Secure the Lowest Price!
features.description: Limited to 400 (ETH 200 + SOL 200) — The price continues to rise as they sell.

items.title: NFT Public Sale Starts
items.description: Sale of 400 limited premium memberships (ETH 200 + SOL 200)

items.title: 1st Store Grand Open
items.description: Start of luxury delivery health store operation in Tokyo

items.title: First Revenue Share
items.description: Start of holder return program

items.title: 2nd Store / DAO
items.description: Multi-store expansion and transition to DAO

team.subtitle: Team
team.title: Professionals in Industry & Web3.
team.description: CEO: 248ma - 12 years industry experience, founding member of a major group with 10+ stores, built a group with 2B JPY annual revenue from scratch.

members.name: Lawyer
members.description: Legal supervision of Entertainment Business Act & Payment Services Act

items.question: How is revenue sharing conducted?
items.answer: We plan to return 5% of the store's monthly sales to NFT holders. The frequency and method will be decided in consultation with lawyers, prioritizing legal compliance. In the future, we aim for automatic distribution via smart contracts.

items.question: Are there legal risks?
items.answer: This project operates in compliance with relevant laws such as the Entertainment Business Act, Payment Services Act, and Financial Instruments and Exchange Act. We are building a legal scheme under the supervision of dedicated lawyers and administrative scriveners. However, please understand the risks as regulations regarding crypto assets and NFTs may change.

items.question: Can I resell the NFT?
items.answer: Yes, secondary trading (resale) is possible on major NFT marketplaces like OpenSea and Magic Eden. Upon secondary trading, 3% of the transaction amount will be returned to the project as royalty, used for operating funds and holder returns.

items.question: Will the physical store really open?
items.answer: Yes, we are already proceeding with property selection and cast recruitment for the grand opening of the 1st store in the Shinjuku area, Tokyo, in February 2026. We will reliably launch the business leveraging the CEO's extensive track record and network in the industry.

items.question: Is cryptocurrency required for purchase?
items.answer: Basically, purchase will be made with Ethereum (ETH) or Solana (SOL), but we are also considering introducing credit card payments. We plan to provide a detailed guide so that first-time users can also purchase.

cookie_policy.title: Cookie & Storage Usage
cookie_policy.content: This site respects your privacy and does not use tracking cookies. We only use browser local storage (localStorage) to maintain essential functions such as age verification and language settings. No personal tracking or data sharing with third parties occurs.

footer.disclaimer: This project does not guarantee revenue or increase in NFT value. Risks specific to crypto assets and the adult entertainment industry exist. All investment decisions are at your own risk.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: These Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as "Terms") set forth the conditions for using the NFTs and related services (hereinafter referred to as "Services") provided by SPICY NFT CLUB (hereinafter referred to as "Project"). By using the Services, users are deemed to have agreed to these Terms.

definitions.title: Definitions
definitions.content:
1. "NFT" refers to non-fungible tokens issued on the blockchain.
2. "Holder" refers to a person who legitimately holds an NFT issued by the Project.
3. "Wallet" refers to software for managing crypto assets and NFTs.

nft_rights.title: Rights of NFT
nft_rights.content:
1. Holders have the right to use and display their NFTs for personal purposes.
2. Holding an NFT does not grant voting rights or equity interest in the Project's operation.
3. Intellectual property rights belong to the Project and are not transferred to the Holder.

prohibitions.title: Prohibited Acts
prohibitions.content:
Users shall not engage in the following acts:
1. Acts that violate laws or public order and morals
2. Acts involved in criminal activities such as money laundering
3. Acts that interfere with the operation of the Project
4. Acts that cause nuisance to other users

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content:
1. The Project does not guarantee the value of NFTs or future revenue.
2. The Project is not responsible for blockchain network failures or high gas fees.
3. The Project is not involved in disputes between users.

modifications.title: Modification of Terms
modifications.content: The Project may modify these Terms without prior notice to users if deemed necessary. The modified Terms shall take effect from the time they are displayed on this site.

governing_law.title: Governing Law & Jurisdiction
governing_law.content: These Terms shall be interpreted in accordance with Japanese law. The Tokyo District Court shall have exclusive jurisdiction over any disputes related to the Services.

location.label: Location
location.value: Shinjuku 3-chome, Shinjuku-ku, Tokyo 160-0022 (Details will be disclosed without delay upon request)

price.label: Selling Price
price.value: Based on the price displayed on each NFT purchase page (ETH/SOL).

charges.label: Additional Charges
charges.value: Gas fees for the blockchain network are required separately.

delivery.label: Delivery Time
delivery.value: Sent to your wallet immediately after the blockchain transaction is confirmed upon payment completion.

return.label: Returns & Cancellations
return.value: Due to the nature of digital data, returns, cancellations, or exchanges are not accepted after payment completion.

system_requirements.label: System Requirements
system_requirements.value: A browser environment compatible with Web3 wallets like MetaMask (Chrome, Firefox, Brave, etc.) is required.

age_gate.title: AGE VERIFICATION
age_gate.description:
This website contains adult content.
Are you 18 years of age or older?

security.desc: Ensuring transparency in all transactions and operations through blockchain technology. Building a clean ecosystem without fraud.

global.title: Global Standards

tech.title: Innovation
tech.desc: Fusing cutting-edge Web3 technology with real business to realize a sustainable and fair business model.

exit_page.note: *Access to the main content of this site is restricted to those under 18 in accordance with laws and regulations.
